3: War has long since ravaged this city... Perhaps, for too long.
The once prosperous and orderly city streets are now broken into dusty and disorderly ruins.
After killing the last Corrupted in the barricade, Qu could finally take a breath as the remaining soldiers evacuated the heavy artillery.
As for the other places... There's no point in rescuing them.
Because their channels have all been in radio silence.
There were no oversights in command and our preparations were sufficient. But that did little to change the results...
Even so... The Kowloong people still needed this war.
'Without real pain, people do not recognize the choices they have to make.'
Qu flicks her glaive to the side, splattering the black ichor onto the broken wooden column beside her.
Connected to Heng Ji's encrypted channel.
What was Qu thinking... when she made this choice...?
After a brief moment of hesitation, Huaxu sends the data to the output.
And AI should not hesitate or doubt.
